pageProduct.name: Sukin Deep Cleanse Shampoo 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Refreshes With A Blend Of Native Australian River Mint, Apple Cider Vinegar & Sustainably Sourced Algae.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Cooling Deep Cleanse Shampoo Gently Removes Product Build Up And Excess Oils With Native Australian River Mint And Apple Cider Vinegar To Instantly Refresh The Scalp. With Sustainably Sourced Algae And Native Australian Lemon Myrtle To Help Extend Time In-Between Washes And Protect The Scalp From Environmental Damage. Infused With The Scent Of Freesia And Lily.

Ingredients

Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Sodium Lauroylmethyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Algae Extract, Vinegar Extract (Apple Cider), Mentha Australis Leaf Extract (River Mint), Aloebarbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean)Oil, Backhousia Citriodora Leaf Oil (Lemon Myrtle), Menthol, Sorbitol, Glycerin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Polyquaternium-10, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Hexyl Cinnamal**, Linalool***Natural Fragrance**Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Wet Hair And Massage Into The Scalp To Form A Gentle Lather. Rinse Thoroughly. Follow With Sukin Deep Cleanse Conditioner.
